price: Preis sei Ihm! Überaus hoch Erhaben ist Er über das, was sie sagen.
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يَقُولُونَ عُلُوّٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: sub'ḥānahu wataʿālā ʿammā yaqūlūna ʿuluwwan kabīran
